metadata.titleEn: Dataset of Heihe integrated observatory network: eddy covariance system of Huazhaizi station, 2022
metadata.titleCn: 黑河流域地表过程综合观测网：花寨子站涡动相关仪（2022）
metadata.description:
This dataset contains the flux measurements from the Huazhaizi station eddy covariance system (EC) in the midstream reaches of the Heihe integrated observatory network from January 1 to December 31 in 2022. The site (100.3201° E, 38.7659° N) was located in the Zhangye City in Gansu Province. The elevation is 1731 m. The EC was installed at a height of 4.5 m, and the sampling rate was 10 Hz. The sonic anemometer faced north, and the separation distance between the sonic anemometer and the CO2/H2O gas analyzer (CSAT3&Li7500A) was 0.15 m.
The raw data acquired at 10 Hz were processed using the Eddypro post-processing software, including the spike detection, lag correction of H2O/CO2 relative to the vertical wind component, sonic virtual temperature correction, coordinate rotation (2-D rotation), corrections for density fluctuation (Webb-Pearman-Leuning correction), and frequency response correction. The EC data were subsequently averaged over 30 min periods. The observation data quality was divided into three classes according to the quality assessment method of stationarity (Δst) and the integral turbulent characteristics test (ITC): class 1-3 (high quality), class 4-6 (good), class 7-8 (poor, better than gap filling data), class9 (rejected). In addition to the above processing steps, the half-hourly flux data were screened in a four-step procedure: (1) data from periods of sensor malfunction were rejected; (2) data collected before or after 1 h of precipitation were rejected; (3) incomplete 30 min data were rejected when the missing data constituted more than 10% of the 30 min raw record. There were 48 records per day, and the missing data were replaced with -6999. Suspicious data were marked in red. 
The released data contained the following variables: data/time, wind direction (Wdir, °), wind speed (Wnd, m/s), the standard deviation of the lateral wind (Std_Uy, m/s), virtual temperature (Tv, ℃), H2O mass density (H2O, g/m3), CO2 mass density (CO2, mg/m3), friction velocity (ustar, m/s), stability (z/L), sensible heat flux (Hs, W/m2), latent heat flux (LE, W/m2), carbon dioxide flux (Fc, mg/ (m2s)), quality assessment of the sensible heat flux (QA_Hs), quality assessment of the latent heat flux (QA_LE), and quality assessment of the carbon flux (QA_Fc). In this dataset, the time of 0:30 corresponds to the average data for the period between 0:00 and 0:30; the data were stored in *.xls format. Detailed information can be found in the suggested references.
For more information, please refer to Liu et al. (2018) (for sites information), Liu et al. (2011) for data processing) in the Citation section.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2022年1月1日至2022年12月31日的黑河流域地表过程综合观测网中游花寨子站涡动相关仪观测数据。站点位于甘肃省张掖市，下垫面是荒漠。观测点的经纬度是100.3201E, 38.7659N，海拔1731.00m。涡动相关仪的架高4.5m，采样频率是10Hz，超声朝向是正北向，超声风速温度仪（CSAT3）与CO2/H2O分析仪（Li7500A）之间的距离是15cm。
涡动相关仪的原始观测数据为10Hz，发布的数据是采用Eddypro软件处理的30分钟数据，其处理的主要步骤包括：野点值剔除，延迟时间校正，坐标旋转（二次坐标旋转），频率响应修正，超声虚温修正和密度（WPL）修正等。同时对各通量值进行质量评价，主要是大气平稳性（Δst）和湍流相似性特征（ITC）的检验。对Eddypro软件输出的30min通量值也进行了筛选：（1）剔除仪器出错时的数据；（2）剔除降水前后1h的数据；（3）剔除10Hz原始数据中每30min内缺失率大于10%的数据。观测数据的平均周期为30分钟，一天48个数据，缺失数据标记为-6999。
发布的观测数据包括：日期/时间Date/Time，风向Wdir（°），水平风速Wnd（m/s），侧向风速标准差Std_Uy（m/s），超声虚温Tv（℃），水汽密度H2O（g/m3），二氧化碳浓度CO2（mg/m3），摩擦速度Ustar（m/s），奥布霍夫长度L（m），感热通量Hs（W/m2），潜热通量LE（W/m2），二氧化碳通量Fc（mg/(m2s)），感热通量的质量标识QA_Hs，潜热通量的质量标识QA_LE，二氧化碳通量的质量标识QA_Fc。感热、潜热、二氧化碳通量的质量标识分为九级（质量标识1-3数据质量好，4-6数据质量较好，7-8数据质量较差（较插补数据好）；9数据质量差））。数据时间的含义，如0:30代表0:00-0:30的平均；数据以*.xls格式存储。
黑河流域地表过程综合观测网或站点信息请参考Liu et al. (2018)，观测数据处理请参考Liu et al. (2011)。

background: Arid and semiarid regions represent approximately 30 % of the global terrestrial surface area (Dregne, 1991; Scanlon et al., 2006), and dryland expansion occurs under climate change, especially in developing countries (Huang et al., 2016). An oasis is a unique ecological landscape in arid and semi-arid areas that is not only the core of regions’ ecological environment but also the foundation of their economic development, especially in western China, which has been an important part of the “Silk Road” since ancient times. Oases comprising less than 10 % of the total area of arid regions support more than 90 % of the population in these regions of China (Chu et al., 2005; Li et al., 2016; Zhou et al., 2022). The oasis–desert system plays a crucial role in maintaining a stable ecological environment and agricultural productivity (Zhang and Zhao, 2015). Extensive studies have investigated energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas based on field and remote-sensing observations (Taha et al., 1991; Potchter et al., 2008; Xue et al., 2019; Wang et al., 2019; Zhou et al., 2022) and numerical simulations (Chu et al., 2005; Meng et al., 2009; Georgescu et al., 2011; Liu et al., 2020). In addition, oasis–desert areas located in semiarid regions have been found to be carbon sinks by previous researchers (Tagesson et al., 2016; Wang et al., 2019); thus, they can significantly affect the carbon balance of arid regions and play an increasingly important role within the global carbon cycle.
research objective: Therefore, it is critical to maintain the balance between oasis and desert systems in order to achieve the goal of sustainable oasis development. Understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is important to achieve the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in the oasis–desert area and support the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis. A quantitative understanding of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas is crucial to recognize the oasis–desert interactions and is significant to protect the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases; moreover, long-term observations are indispensable.
challenges: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas are facing the crisis of ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, the degradation of natural vegetation, the intensification of land desertification, and the frequent occurrence of dust storms, especially in many inland river basins westward along the Silk Road, such as the Tarim River basin (Zhao et al., 2013), the Aral Sea basin (Stanev et al., 2004; Crétaux et al., 2009), and the Lake Urmia basin (Stone, 2015).
methods: In this study, we present a suite of observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems that consist of long-term energy, water vapor, carbon and methane fluxes as well as auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters from 2012 to 2021. Half-hourly turbulent flux data were acquired by an eddy covariance system and scintillometer. The hydrometeorological data (including radiation, soil heat flux, and soil temperature profiles; gradients of air temperature and humidity and of wind speed and direction; and air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles) were observed from automatic weather stations with a 10 min average period as well as the groundwater table data. Moreover, vegetation and soil parameters were also supplemented in the datasets. The data processing and quality control procedure can be divided into data collection, data processing, and data archiving and sharing.
dataset: The study area comprises the middle and lower reaches of the HRB, located in the arid regions of western China, that receive water from the typical cryosphere of the upper reaches. A total of 11 land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in these regions since 2012 – 2 superstations and 9 ordinary stations. The dataset of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas reported in this study (including energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes; hydrometeorological data; and vegetation and soil parameters) is freely available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
backgroundCn: 干旱和半干旱地区约占全球陆地表面积的30%（Dregne, 1991；Scanlon et al., 2006），在气候变化的影响下，干旱地区的扩展尤其发生在发展中国家（Huang et al., 2016）。绿洲是干旱和半干旱地区独特的生态景观，不仅是这些地区生态环境的核心，也是经济发展的基础，尤其是在中国西部，自古以来就是“丝绸之路”的重要组成部分。绿洲占干旱地区总面积的不到10%，却支持着中国这些地区90%以上的人口（Chu et al., 2005；Li et al., 2016；Zhou et al., 2022）。绿洲-沙漠系统在维持稳定的生态环境和农业生产力方面发挥着至关重要的作用（Zhang and Zhao, 2015）。大量研究基于实地和遥感观测（Taha et al., 1991；Potchter et al., 2008；Xue et al., 2019；Wang et al., 2019；Zhou et al., 2022）以及数值模拟（Chu et al., 2005；Meng et al., 2009；Georgescu et al., 2011；Liu et al., 2020）对绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换进行了广泛研究。此外，位于半干旱地区的绿洲-沙漠地区已被先前研究者发现是碳汇（Tagesson et al., 2016；Wang et al., 2019）；因此，它们可以显著影响干旱地区的碳平衡，并在全球碳循环中发挥越来越重要的作用。
research objectiveCn: 因此，保持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续绿洲发展的目标至关重要。了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，对于实现绿洲-沙漠地区的碳达峰和碳中和目标，以及支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展是非常重要的。对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解对于认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用至关重要，并且对保护生态稳定性和绿洲的社会经济发展具有重要意义；此外，长期观测是不可或缺的。
challengesCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态环境退化的危机，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及沙尘暴频繁发生，尤其是在丝绸之路沿线的许多内陆河流流域，如塔里木河流域（赵等，2013），咸海流域（Stanev等，2004；Crétaux等，2009）和乌尔米湖流域（Stone，2015）。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，我们呈现了一套来自人工和自然绿洲–沙漠系统的观测数据集，这些数据集包括2012年至2021年的长期能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。半小时的湍流通量数据是通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取的。水文气象数据（包括辐射、土壤热通量和土壤温度剖面；空气温度和湿度的梯度，以及风速和风向的梯度；空气压力、降水和土壤湿度剖面）是通过自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期观测的，同时也包括地下水位数据。此外，数据集中还补充了植被和土壤参数。数据处理和质量控制程序可以分为数据收集、数据处理和数据归档与共享。
datasetCn: 研究区域包括位于中国西部干旱地区的HRB中下游，水源来自上游典型的冰冻圈。自2012年以来，在这些地区建立了11个地表通量和气象站，包括2个超级站和9个普通站。本研究报告的绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换观测数据集（包括能量、水汽和碳通量；水文气象数据；以及植被和土壤参数）可从国家西藏高原数据中心免费获取。

Verification.QuestionEn: Are eddy covariance systems used as a data collection method for carbon and methane fluxes in oasis–desert systems?
Verification.QuestionCn: 涡度协方差系统是否被用作收集绿洲-沙漠系统中碳和甲烷通量的数据收集方法？

Verification.QuestionEn: Are datasets related to energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas freely available from a data center?
Verification.QuestionCn: 与绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水蒸气和碳交换相关的数据集是否可以从数据中心免费获取？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Is data collection in oasis–desert systems more effectively achieved through eddy covariance systems, scintillometers, or automatic weather stations?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中，数据收集是通过涡度协方差系统、闪烁仪还是自动气象站更有效？
Disjunctive.AnswerEn: eddy covariance systems, scintillometers, automatic weather stations
Disjunctive.AnswerCn: 涡度相关系统、闪烁仪、自动气象站

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Are carbon exchange datasets in arid regions primarily sourced from artificial oasis systems, natural oasis systems, or both?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 干旱地区的碳交换数据集主要来源于人工绿洲系统、自然绿洲系统，还是两者都有？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Which challenges are more prevalent in arid region inland river basins: river and lake drying, vegetation degradation, or dust storms?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区的内陆河流流域中，河流和湖泊干涸、植被退化或沙尘暴哪种挑战更为普遍？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where are the observational datasets from oasis–desert systems collected in the context of arid regions?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区，oasis–desert系统的观测数据集是在哪里收集的？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the key challenges faced in maintaining ecological balance in oasis–desert systems in arid and semiarid regions?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区，维持绿洲-沙漠系统生态平衡面临的主要挑战有哪些？

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a data collection method used to gather information on energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Example.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，用于收集能量、水蒸气和碳交换信息的数据收集方法的一个例子是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method is the use of an eddy covariance system and scintillometer to acquire half-hourly turbulent flux data, supplemented by hydrometeorological observations from automatic weather stations.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种数据收集方法是使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取半小时的湍流通量数据，并辅以自动气象站的水文气象观测。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a dataset that includes long-term observational data on oasis–desert systems and its components?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个包含关于绿洲-沙漠系统及其组成部分的长期观察数据的数据集示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of such a dataset comprises long-term energy, water vapor, carbon, and methane fluxes, along with auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters, collected from the middle and lower reaches of the Heihe River Basin (HRB) in western China.
Example.AnswerCn: 这样的数据集的一个例子包括来自中国西部黑河流域中下游的长期能量、水汽、碳和甲烷通量，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced by inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas that impacts data collection and ecological research?
Example.QuestionCn: 内陆河流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临的一个挑战是什么，这会影响数据收集和生态研究？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a challenge is the ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, and frequent occurrence of dust storms in inland river basins like the Tarim River basin.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个挑战的例子是生态环境的恶化，例如河流和湖泊的干涸、自然植被的退化、土地沙漠化的加剧，以及内陆河流流域（如塔里木河流域）频繁发生的沙尘暴。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What characteristics define the data collection techniques used in monitoring energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 监测绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的数据收集技术的特点是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: eddy covariance system, half-hourly turbulent flux data, scintillometers, automatic weather stations, hydrometeorological data, radiation, soil heat flux, soil temperature profiles
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 涡度相关系统、半小时湍流通量数据、闪烁仪、自动气象站、水文气象数据、辐射、土壤热通量、土壤温度剖面。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the specific challenges faced in collecting data for oasis–desert systems in arid and semiarid inland river basins?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱内陆河流流域中，收集绿洲-沙漠系统数据面临的具体挑战是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, frequent dust storms
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 河流和湖泊干涸，天然植被退化，土地荒漠化加剧，频繁的沙尘暴。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What attributes are critical for datasets related to energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in arid regions?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 与干旱地区的能源、水蒸气和碳交换观测相关的数据集的关键属性是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: energy fluxes, water vapor fluxes, carbon fluxes, gradients of air temperature, gradients of humidity, wind speed, wind direction, air pressure, precipitation, soil moisture profiles, vegetation parameters, soil parameters
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 能量通量、水汽通量、碳通量、空气温度梯度、湿度梯度、风速、风向、气压、降水、土壤湿度剖面、植被参数、土壤参数

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the sampling frequency of the eddy covariance system used in the data collection method?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 用于数据收集方法的涡度协方差系统的采样频率是多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many data points are collected per day using the specified data collection method?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 使用指定的数据收集方法，每天收集多少数据点？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is an eddy covariance system and how is it used in data collection for energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in arid regions?
Definition.QuestionCn: 什么是涡度协方差系统，它如何用于收集干旱地区的能量、水汽和碳交换数据？
Definition.AnswerEn: An eddy covariance system is a key data collection method used to measure turbulent fluxes of energy, water vapor, and carbon in arid regions. It provides half-hourly data on these fluxes and is complemented by other instruments such as scintillometers for comprehensive observation.
Definition.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差系统是一种关键的数据收集方法，用于测量干旱地区能量、水蒸气和碳的湍流通量。它提供这些通量的半小时数据，并通过其他仪器如闪烁仪进行综合观测。

Definition.QuestionEn: What are the primary challenges in collecting data related to ecological environment degradation in inland river basins of arid and semiarid areas?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区的内陆河流流域收集与生态环境退化相关的数据时，主要面临的挑战有哪些？
Definition.AnswerEn: The primary challenges include dealing with ecological crises such as drying rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, and frequent dust storms, which complicate data collection and require robust methodologies to capture accurate environmental data.
Definition.AnswerCn: 主要挑战包括应对生态危机，如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及频繁的沙尘暴，这些都使数据收集变得复杂，并需要强有力的方法来捕捉准确的环境数据。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do data collection methods using eddy covariance systems compare to those using scintillometers in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，使用涡度协方差系统的数据收集方法与使用闪烁仪的数据收集方法相比如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Eddy covariance systems provide half-hourly turbulent flux data, which is crucial for understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges. Scintillometers also contribute to this understanding, but the specific differences in data they provide are not detailed in the field description above.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差系统提供半小时的湍流通量数据，这对于理解能量、水蒸气和碳交换至关重要。闪烁仪也有助于这一理解，但上述领域描述中没有详细说明它们提供的数据的具体差异。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In what ways do the data processing techniques for eddy covariance data differ from those used for hydrometeorological data in oasis–desert studies?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠研究中，涡度协方差数据的处理技术与水文气象数据的处理技术有哪些不同之处？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Eddy covariance data processing involves steps like coordinate rotation, frequency response correction, and quality assessment, whereas hydrometeorological data involves processing for radiation, soil heat flux, and temperature profiles with a 10-minute average period. Both require careful data archiving and sharing procedures.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差数据处理涉及坐标旋转、频率响应校正和质量评估等步骤，而水文气象数据则涉及辐射、土壤热通量和温度剖面的处理，平均时间为10分钟。两者都需要仔细的数据归档和共享程序。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the main differences in challenges faced when collecting data in oasis–desert systems compared to other arid or semiarid regions?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在收集绿洲-沙漠系统的数据时，与其他干旱或半干旱地区相比，面临的主要挑战有哪些？
Comparison.AnswerEn: In oasis–desert systems, maintaining the balance between oasis and desert areas is critical due to their impact on ecological stability and socioeconomic development. Other arid regions face challenges like river and lake drying, vegetation degradation, and increased desertification, which may not be as pronounced or have the same socioeconomic impacts as in oasis–desert ecosystems.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中，维持绿洲和沙漠区域之间的平衡至关重要，因为这对生态稳定性和社会经济发展有着重要影响。其他干旱地区面临着河流和湖泊干涸、植被退化以及沙漠化加剧等挑战，这些问题可能没有在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中那么明显或对社会经济产生同样的影响。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What are the main challenges faced in data collection in arid and semiarid inland river basins, and how can long-term observational datasets help address these challenges?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱内陆河流流域，数据收集面临的主要挑战有哪些？长期观测数据集如何帮助解决这些挑战？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The main challenges in arid and semiarid inland river basins include ecological environment degradation, such as river and lake drying, natural vegetation degradation, land desertification, and dust storms. Long-term observational datasets, which include energy, water vapor, carbon, and methane fluxes, help address these challenges by providing essential data for understanding and maintaining the balance between oasis and desert systems, which is critical for sustainable development.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 干旱和半干旱内陆河流流域面临的主要挑战包括生态环境退化，如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化和沙尘暴。长期观测数据集，包括能量、水汽、碳和甲烷通量，有助于应对这些挑战，通过提供必要的数据来理解和维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡，这对可持续发展至关重要。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways do auxiliary data, such as hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters, contribute to the robustness and applicability of datasets focused on oasis-desert areas?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 辅助数据，如水文气象、植被和土壤参数，如何增强以绿洲-沙漠地区为重点的数据集的稳健性和适用性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Auxiliary data, such as hydrometeorological observations and vegetation and soil parameters, complement the primary flux data by providing additional context and insights into the environmental conditions affecting the oasis-desert systems. This comprehensive dataset structure enhances the robustness and applicability of the datasets, facilitating a more accurate and holistic understanding of the ecological and climatic interactions in these regions.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 辅助数据，如水文气象观测和植被及土壤参数，补充了主要通量数据，通过提供额外的背景和对影响绿洲-沙漠系统的环境条件的洞察。这种综合数据集结构增强了数据集的稳健性和适用性，有助于更准确和全面地理解这些地区的生态和气候相互作用。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the selection of specific locations for installing eddy covariance systems in arid and semi-arid regions?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区，选择特定地点安装涡度协方差系统的因素包括哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Locations for eddy covariance systems are typically selected based on the need to understand energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems, which are crucial for maintaining ecological stability and supporting sustainable development in these regions.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差系统的选址通常基于理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的需要，这对于维持生态稳定性和支持这些地区的可持续发展至关重要。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of integrating long-term observations from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems using eddy covariance systems on the understanding of energy and carbon exchanges?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 将人工和自然绿洲-沙漠系统的长期观测数据整合，使用涡度协方差系统对能量和碳交换的理解可能产生的潜在后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Integrating long-term observations from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems using eddy covariance systems can enhance the understanding of energy and carbon exchanges by providing quantitative insights into these exchanges in oasis–desert ecosystems. This understanding is crucial for achieving carbon peaking and carbon neutrality goals, supporting ecological security, and promoting sustainable development in these areas.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 通过使用涡度协方差系统整合人工和自然绿洲-沙漠系统的长期观测，可以增强对能量和碳交换的理解，提供对绿洲-沙漠生态系统中这些交换的定量洞察。这种理解对于实现碳达峰和碳中和目标、支持生态安全以及促进这些地区的可持续发展至关重要。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What outcomes might result from the inclusion of auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters in observational datasets for oasis–desert systems?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 将水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据纳入绿洲-沙漠系统的观测数据集可能会产生哪些结果？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The inclusion of auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters in observational datasets for oasis–desert systems can lead to more comprehensive datasets that offer a better understanding of the interactions between energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange processes. This comprehensive approach enhances the ability to assess the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 在观察性数据集中纳入与水文气象、植被和土壤参数相关的辅助数据，可以形成更全面的数据集，从而更好地理解能量、水汽和碳交换过程之间的相互作用。这种综合方法增强了评估绿洲生态稳定性和社会经济发展的能力。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary objective of collecting long-term energy, water vapor, and carbon flux data in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中收集长期能量、水蒸气和碳通量数据的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objective is to achieve a quantitative understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems, which is crucial for recognizing oasis–desert interactions and supporting ecological security and sustainable development of oases. This understanding is significant for achieving carbon peaking and carbon neutrality goals, as well as maintaining the balance between oasis and desert systems.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是实现对绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的定量理解，这对于认识绿洲-沙漠相互作用以及支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展至关重要。这种理解对于实现碳达峰和碳中和目标，以及维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡具有重要意义。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the significance of implementing data quality control procedures in the collection of turbulent flux data in oasis–desert areas?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠地区收集湍流通量数据时，实施数据质量控制程序的重要性是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Implementing data quality control procedures is significant to ensure the reliability and accuracy of the collected turbulent flux data. This is crucial for supporting the ecological security and sustainable development of oasis–desert areas, as it provides a dependable basis for understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges, which are critical for achieving sustainable oasis development.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 实施数据质量控制程序对于确保收集的湍流通量数据的可靠性和准确性至关重要。这对于支持绿洲-沙漠地区的生态安全和可持续发展至关重要，因为它为理解能量、水汽和碳交换提供了可靠的基础，这对于实现可持续的绿洲发展至关重要。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the procedural steps involved in processing data collected by an eddy covariance system to ensure quality and accuracy?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 通过涡度协方差系统处理收集的数据以确保质量和准确性的程序步骤有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The data collected by an eddy covariance system is processed using Eddypro software. The main steps include outlier removal, delay time correction, coordinate rotation (secondary coordinate rotation), frequency response correction, ultrasonic virtual temperature correction, and density (WPL) correction. Additionally, the quality of each flux value is evaluated, with checks for atmospheric stability (Δst) and turbulence similarity characteristics (ITC). The processed data is then filtered by removing erroneous instrument data, data within 1 hour before and after precipitation, and data with more than 10% missing rate in the 10Hz raw data for each 30-minute segment.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 通过涡度协方差系统收集的数据使用Eddypro软件进行处理。主要步骤包括异常值去除、延迟时间校正、坐标旋转（次级坐标旋转）、频率响应校正、超声波虚拟温度校正和密度（WPL）校正。此外，还评估每个通量值的质量，检查大气稳定性（Δst）和湍流相似性特征（ITC）。处理后的数据经过过滤，去除错误的仪器数据、降水前后1小时内的数据，以及在每个30分钟段内10Hz原始数据缺失率超过10%的数据。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How are data from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems collected and managed to ensure comprehensive coverage of energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes over long periods?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 人工和自然绿洲-沙漠系统的数据是如何收集和管理的，以确保对能量、水蒸气和碳通量的长期全面覆盖？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Data from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems are collected using a combination of eddy covariance systems and scintillometers for turbulent flux data. Hydrometeorological data, including radiation, soil heat flux, soil temperature profiles, gradients of air temperature and humidity, wind speed and direction, air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles, are observed from automatic weather stations with a 10-minute average period. Groundwater table data and supplementary vegetation and soil parameters are also included. Data processing involves collection, processing, and archiving/sharing to ensure comprehensive coverage and quality control over extended periods.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 人工和自然绿洲-沙漠系统的数据通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪的组合收集，以获取湍流通量数据。水文气象数据，包括辐射、土壤热通量、土壤温度剖面、空气温度和湿度梯度、风速和风向、气压、降水和土壤湿度剖面，均通过自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期进行观测。地下水位数据以及补充的植被和土壤参数也被纳入。数据处理涉及数据的收集、处理和归档/共享，以确保在较长时间内的全面覆盖和质量控制。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What data processing techniques enable the transformation of raw eddy covariance data into usable flux measurements in arid regions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些数据处理技术能够将原始涡度协方差数据转化为干旱地区可用的通量测量值？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The data processing techniques include the use of Eddypro software to handle raw 10Hz data and convert it into 30-minute intervals. The steps involve despiking, time delay correction, double coordinate rotation, frequency response correction, sonic virtual temperature correction, and density (WPL) correction. Quality assessment of the flux values is also conducted, focusing on atmospheric stability and turbulence similarity tests.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 数据处理技术包括使用Eddypro软件处理原始10Hz数据并将其转换为30分钟间隔。步骤包括去尖峰、时间延迟校正、双坐标旋转、频率响应校正、声学虚温校正和密度（WPL）校正。还对通量值进行质量评估，重点关注大气稳定性和湍流相似性测试。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What challenges are encountered in maintaining long-term observational datasets in arid inland river basins, and how are these conditions managed to ensure data quality?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 在干旱内陆河流流域中，维护长期观测数据集面临哪些挑战，以及如何管理这些条件以确保数据质量？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Challenges include ecological environment degradation such as drying rivers, vegetation degradation, increased desertification, and dust storms. Data quality is managed through strict data filtering processes, including removing erroneous data, filtering based on precipitation events, and ensuring low data loss rates within each 30-minute interval. Additionally, data processing and archiving procedures are in place to maintain the integrity of the datasets.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 挑战包括生态环境退化，如河流干涸、植被退化、沙漠化加剧和沙尘暴。数据质量通过严格的数据过滤过程进行管理，包括去除错误数据、基于降水事件进行过滤，以及确保每30分钟间隔内的数据丢失率低。此外，还建立了数据处理和归档程序，以维护数据集的完整性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might data collected from oasis–desert ecosystems be considered crucial for understanding carbon cycle dynamics in arid regions?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么从绿洲-沙漠生态系统收集的数据被认为对理解干旱地区的碳循环动态至关重要？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Previous research has identified oasis–desert areas as carbon sinks, which can significantly affect the carbon balance of arid regions and play an increasingly important role within the global carbon cycle. Understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in these ecosystems is essential for achieving carbon peaking and carbon neutrality goals.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 先前的研究已确定绿洲-沙漠地区作为碳汇，这对干旱地区的碳平衡产生显著影响，并在全球碳循环中扮演着越来越重要的角色。了解这些生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的基本特征，对于实现碳达峰和碳中和目标至关重要。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to maintain a balance between oasis and desert systems when collecting data for sustainable development research?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在收集可持续发展研究数据时，为什么在绿洲和沙漠系统之间保持平衡很重要？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Maintaining a balance is crucial because oases, which comprise less than 10% of the area in arid regions, support more than 90% of the population. The oasis–desert system plays a crucial role in maintaining a stable ecological environment and agricultural productivity, which is essential for the sustainable development of these regions.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 维持平衡至关重要，因为绿洲在干旱地区的面积不到10%，却支持着90%以上的人口。绿洲-沙漠系统在维持稳定的生态环境和农业生产力方面发挥着关键作用，这对这些地区的可持续发展至关重要。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might researchers face challenges when collecting environmental data in inland river basins of arid and semiarid areas?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 研究人员在干旱和半干旱地区的内陆河流流域收集环境数据时可能面临哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Researchers may encounter ecological degradation challenges, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, natural vegetation degradation, land desertification, and frequent dust storms. These issues are particularly prevalent in many inland river basins along the Silk Road, making data collection difficult.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 研究人员可能会遇到生态退化的挑战，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化以及频繁的沙尘暴。这些问题在丝绸之路沿线的许多内陆河流流域尤为突出，使得数据收集变得困难。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How effective are the current data collection methods in accurately capturing the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 当前的数据收集方法在准确捕捉绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的能量、水汽和碳交换方面的有效性如何？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The current data collection methods appear effective as they utilize advanced systems like the eddy covariance system and scintillometer for capturing energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges. These methods are complemented by hydrometeorological observations from automatic weather stations, ensuring comprehensive data capture.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 当前的数据收集方法似乎有效，因为它们利用了先进的系统，如涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪，来捕捉能量、水蒸气和碳的交换。这些方法得到了自动气象站的水文气象观测的补充，确保了全面的数据捕获。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What challenges might arise in maintaining the quality and reliability of datasets in arid and semiarid regions, particularly considering the ecological issues identified?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区，维护数据集的质量和可靠性可能会面临哪些挑战，特别是考虑到已识别的生态问题？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Challenges in maintaining dataset quality in such regions include dealing with ecological degradation like drying rivers, land desertification, and dust storms. These conditions could impact data collection equipment and affect the consistency and reliability of the data.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 在这些地区，维护数据集质量的挑战包括应对生态退化，如河流干涸、土地沙漠化和沙尘暴。这些条件可能影响数据收集设备，并影响数据的一致性和可靠性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In what ways could datasets be expanded or refined to better support sustainable development goals in oasis–desert areas?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何扩展或完善数据集，以更好地支持绿洲-沙漠地区的可持续发展目标？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Datasets could be expanded by incorporating long-term observations and additional auxiliary data such as detailed vegetation and soil parameters. Refining data processing techniques and ensuring robust quality control measures can also enhance dataset reliability, aiding sustainable development goals.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 通过纳入长期观测和额外的辅助数据，如详细的植被和土壤参数，可以扩展数据集。改进数据处理技术并确保强有力的质量控制措施也可以增强数据集的可靠性，从而有助于可持续发展目标。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how data collection methods address the challenges of ecological environment degradation in arid and semiarid regions.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白数据收集方法如何应对干旱和半干旱地区生态环境退化的挑战。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The methods involve using long-term observational datasets from oasis–desert systems, which include energy, water vapor, carbon, and methane fluxes, as well as auxiliary data on hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters. These datasets help in understanding the interactions within oasis–desert ecosystems, which is crucial for addressing ecological challenges.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 这些方法涉及使用来自绿洲-沙漠系统的长期观测数据集，包括能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及关于水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。这些数据集有助于理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统内的相互作用，这对于应对生态挑战至关重要。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how the integration of various datasets aids in understanding the energy and carbon exchanges in oasis–desert systems.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解各种数据集的整合如何有助于理解绿洲-沙漠系统中的能量和碳交换。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The integration of datasets, which include energy, water vapor, carbon fluxes, hydrometeorological data, and vegetation and soil parameters, provides a comprehensive view of the interactions and exchanges in oasis–desert ecosystems. This quantitative understanding is vital for recognizing oasis–desert interactions and ensuring ecological stability and sustainable development.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 数据集的整合，包括能源、水汽、碳通量、水文气象数据以及植被和土壤参数，提供了对绿洲-沙漠生态系统中相互作用和交换的全面视角。这种定量理解对于认识绿洲-沙漠相互作用以及确保生态稳定和可持续发展至关重要。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the challenges faced when collecting long-term observational datasets in the arid and semiarid regions, particularly in the context of oasis-desert systems.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请分析在干旱和半干旱地区收集长期观测数据集时面临的挑战，特别是在绿洲-沙漠系统的背景下。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Challenges include ecological environment degradation such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, natural vegetation degradation, land desertification intensification, and frequent dust storms, which are prevalent in many inland river basins westward along the Silk Road, like the Tarim River basin, the Aral Sea basin, and the Lake Urmia basin.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 挑战包括生态环境退化，如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及频繁的沙尘暴，这些现象在丝绸之路沿线的许多内陆河流流域中普遍存在，如塔里木河流域、咸海流域和乌尔米湖流域。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please identify potential datasets available for studying the oasis-desert interactions in arid regions, focusing on energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请识别可用于研究干旱地区绿洲与沙漠相互作用的潜在数据集，重点关注能量、水汽和碳交换观测。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Potential datasets include long-term energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes, as well as auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters, available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center. The study area includes the middle and lower reaches of the Heihe River Basin, with established land surface flux and meteorological stations since 2012.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 潜在的数据集包括长期的能量、水汽和碳通量，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据，这些数据可从国家西藏高原数据中心获取。研究区域包括黑河流域的中下游，自2012年以来已建立了陆面通量和气象站。
